{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For any radix "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large r"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large (111)_r = r^2 + r + 1,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" hence the given summation is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large \sum_{r = 2}^{16} ( r^2 + r + 1 ) = 1645"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" 
Please see Jake Lai's first three lines for steps to get 1645."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum k^{2} = n(n+1)(2n+1)/6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum k = n(n+1)/2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and of course "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum 1 = n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". We get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{16(16+1)(2 \times 16+1)}{6} + \frac{16(16+1)}{2} + 16 - 3 = 1645"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"having to subtracting "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" since we're missing "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111_{1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Alternatively, you could do something similar but taking advantage of the fact that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(k+1)^{2}-k = 111_{k}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111_2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in decimal system "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=7"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111_3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in decimal system "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=13"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"111_4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in decimal system "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=21"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So we see that the numbers are in a series where the difference increases by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2 :"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7+6\rightarrow13+8\rightarrow21+10\rightarrow31+12\rightarrow43........"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summing these upto the "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"16^{th}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" term, we get "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed {1645}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 111th Problem 2016
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"An improvised rocket is launched from the top of a building "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"150 \text{ feet}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" high. The height"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{ (H) }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"reached by the rocket after"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\text{ (t) }"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"seconds is given by the function:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large H( t ) =40t-10{ t }^{ 2 } "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the distance of the rocket from the ground (in feet) after 3 seconds?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check out the set: 2016 Problems."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In this question, just substitute t = 3 in the given equation. "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"H(t) = (40 × 3) - (10 × 3^2) = (120 - 90) = 30"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
So, the distance from the ground is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"150 + 30 = \boxed{180}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" feet."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"From the question we can write that 10+4=2
so we can say 4=-8
and 11+2=9+4=9-8=1"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
